H0.text: The Royal Border Bridge crosses which river. River Thames

H1.text: The Royal Border Bridge crosses which river. River Severn

H2.text: The Royal Border Bridge crosses which river. River Tyne

H3.text: The Royal Border Bridge crosses which river. Tweed

A4.text: The Royal Border Bridge spans the River Tweed between Berwick-upon-Tweed and Tweedmouth in Northumberland, England.
